name: Cavern Hero
description:
Cavern Hero:

Heroes are seen in many shapes and forms, this hero specifically is seen as a Ninja! And ninjas can do some pretty sweet things, kind of like running upside down to dodge obstacles!



How To Play:

Simply tap the screen to begin and tap again to flip the Hero upside down to avoid obstacles. When it's Game Over, then tap the screen to go back to the starting screen.
There, now you are set and ready to play!
